meanings.definition: A common antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed amoxicillin to help fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: I took amoxicillin for a week to get rid of the bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the amoxicillin and ran away!
meanings.sent4: Amoxicillin was like a superhero fighting off the bacterial villains in my body.
meanings.sent5: The amoxicillin worked tirelessly to battle the bacterial invaders.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a type of penicillin medication.
meanings.sent1: My pharmacist recommended amoxicillin as a cost-effective option.
meanings.sent2: The amoxicillin I bought was the generic version of the penicillin drug.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the amoxicillin was the 'cool kid' of penicillins.
meanings.sent4: Amoxicillin stood out in the crowd of penicillin medications like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: The amoxicillin bottle proudly displayed its generic penicillin identity.

meanings.definition: A prescription drug often prescribed by doctors for various infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended amoxicillin to treat my infection.
meanings.sent2: I picked up the amoxicillin from the pharmacy for my illness.
meanings.sent3: The amoxicillin seemed to wave at me from the medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent4: Amoxicillin was like a trusted friend helping me recover from the infection.
meanings.sent5: I always keep amoxicillin on hand for any unexpected infections.
